summary.span: 使用线性渐变绘制区域。

span.span: Paints an area with a linear gradient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使用线性渐变绘制区域。A paints an area with a linear gradient. 线性渐变定义沿着一条线的渐变。A linear gradient defines a gradient along a line. 通过定义行的结束点和线性渐变的属性。The line's end points are defined by the and properties of the linear gradient. A画笔绘制其沿此行。A brush paints its along this line. 默认的线性渐变是沿对角方向。The default linear gradient is diagonal. 默认情况下，的线性渐变为 (0，0)，正在绘制的区域的左上角并将其为 (1，1) 正在绘制的区域的右下角。In the default, the of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being painted, and its is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being painted. 沿对角线路径内插中生成的渐变的颜色。The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path. 下图显示对角线方向的渐变。The following illustration shows a diagonal gradient. 行已添加以突出显示的渐变的起始点从到终结点的内插路径。A line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point. ![对角线方向线性渐变的渐变轴](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "对角线方向线性渐变的渐变轴")![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") 对角线方向线性渐变A diagonal linear gradient 下一步的图中显示的相同线性渐变，但具有突出显示的渐变停止点。The next illustration shows the same linear gradient, but with highlighted gradient stops. ![中的线性渐变的渐变停止点](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "中的线性渐变的渐变停止")![Gradient stops in a linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "Gradient stops in a linear gradient") 具有突出显示的渐变停止点对角线方向线性渐变A diagonal linear gradient with highlighted gradient stops 可指定未完全填充正在绘制的区域的渐变轴。It is possible to specify a gradient axis that does not completely fill area being painted. 当发生这种情况时，属性确定如何绘制剩余的区域。When this occurs, the property determines how the remaining area is painted. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features A是一种对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。A is a type of object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance. 璝惠功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
